thread.title: Wonderful Stay
thread.title_full: Wonderful Stay - Review of Hotel Duquesne Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: EdwardsPU14
title: Wonderful Stay
text:
We stayed at Hotel Duquesne Eiffel on quick pop in trip to Paris. We loved the location and the staff was very friendly and accommodating. Room was clean and comfy. We had a great time and really enjoyed our stay at this hotel, and would recommend to everyone!
Room Tip: Felt like a luxury hotel for a mid range budget! See more room tips
